r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Officially support Symfony 3.0 and 4.0 #475
### Fixed - Stack level too deep error due to changes in how PHP interprets Opcodes caused by the extension #477
### Changed - Backtrace handler will be run only once and will display information about maximum stack size being reached #478
